summary:
Grandma Dot was a remarkable woman who graced this world with her wisdom, her kindness, and her unwavering love. 
Born in simpler times, she lived through decades of change, witnessing history and shaping her own legacy with grace and determination.  Her life was a testament to resilience, filled with challenges she met with courage and triumphs she celebrated with humility...
title: ðŸ’œ In Loving Memory

title: New Terraform integrations with Crowdstrike, Datadog, JFrog, Red Hat, and more

summary: One underappreciated aspect of developer and security team friction is tool sprawl.  See why it makes security enforcement and visibility so hard and learn how you can fix it
title: How tooling consolidation can help Dev and Sec work together
